00076                 public function summary()
00077                 {
00078                         $stripped = $this->get_stripped_text();
00079                         $off = strpos($stripped, " ", min(250, strlen($stripped)));
00080                         if ($off !== FALSE)
00081                         {
00082                                 return substr($stripped, 0, $off) . "&hellip; " .
00083                                         a(l('Read more'), array('href' => $this->permalink()));
00084                         }
00085                         return $stripped;
00086                 }
